amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on the Global Partnership Against the Spread of Weapons of Mass Destruction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3390 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3390 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To express the sense of Congress on the Global Partnership Against the Spread of Weapons of Mass Destruction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3390 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3390 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
